name: custom_module_bundler
description: 1. What is a Custom Module Bundler? A Module bundler is a tool that:     - Reads our JavaScript files.     - Finds all the import/require() dependencies.     - Builds a dependency graph.     - Combines everything into a single optimized output file.     - Browser can run that single file. In simple words:     It takes many JS files -> analyzes -> Bundles into a 1 final file.
